pricingDetails.baseCarbonPrice: Carbon pricing set by Canadian regulations in CAD per kg of CO2.
pricingDetails.shardToCarbonMapping: 1 shard is equivalent to 202.86 g of CO2.
pricingDetails.tokenPricingFormula: Token Price = Effective Shard Price / Tokens Per Shard
pricingDetails.calculationDescription: Prices are dynamically calculated based on carbon costs and demand.

notes: This configuration tracks live token market data, providing insights into pricing, carbon metrics, and token demand.
